title: NGS Library Prep for Whole Genome Sequencing
author: Opentrons
description: This protocol allows your robot to perform a NGS library prep in whole 96-well plates: which include the steps (1) blund-end repair, (2) adapter addition, (3) ligase, (4) fill-in, and (5) purification with beads. This protocol would require a P10 single-channel pipette and a P300 multi-channel pipette, as well as a temperature and magnetic module.
process:
Download your protocol.
Upload your protocol into the OT App.
Set up your deck according to the deck map.
Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our support article.
Hit "Run".
notes: During the protocol, the program will pause and prompt the user to replace the tipracks. Resume the protocol after the tipracks have been refilled.

markdown.title: NGS Library Prep for Whole Genome Sequencing
markdown.author: [Opentrons](http://www.opentrons.com/)
markdown.description: This protocol allows your robot to perform a NGS library prep in whole 96-well plates: which include the steps (1) blund-end repair, (2) adapter addition, (3) ligase, (4) fill-in, and (5) purification with beads. This protocol would require a P10 single-channel pipette and a P300 multi-channel pipette, as well as a [temperature](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/hardware-modules/products/tempdeck) and [magnetic](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/hardware-modules/products/magdeck) module.
markdown.process:
1. Download your protocol.
2. Upload your protocol into the [OT App](https://opentrons.com/ot-app).
3. Set up your deck according to the deck map.
4. Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our [support article](https://support.opentrons.com/ot-2/getting-started-software-setup/deck-calibration).
5. Hit "Run".
markdown.notes: During the protocol, the program will pause and prompt the user to replace the tipracks. Resume the protocol after the tipracks have been refilled.
